Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2012 04:17AM rsdavid wrote: Hi, Gail - I seem to be right here with you.  Routine mammogram turned into a sonogram and then a biopsy on May 30.  June 5 diagnosis, June 6 MRI, June 7 surgeon, Surgery scheduled for June 14.  What a whirlwind!  Prayers and (((hugs))) for both of us! Sherrie
